member.name: T:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifDecoder
member.summary: Decodes GIF files from stream.

member.name: M:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifDecoder.IsSupportedFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates if the image decoder supports the specified file extension.
member.returns: true, if the decoder supports the specified extensions; otherwise false.
member.exception: is a string of length zero or contains only blanks.

member.name: M:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifDecoder.IsSupportedFileFormat(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Indicates if the image decoder supports the specified file header.
member.returns: true, if the decoder supports the specified file header; otherwise false.

member.name: M:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifDecoder.Decode(ImageTools.ExtendedImage,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Decodes the image from the specified stream and sets the data to image.
member.param: The image, where the data should be set to. Cannot be null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The stream, where the image should be decoded from. Cannot be null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifDecoder.HeaderSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the header for this image type.

member.name: T:ImageTools.IO.Gif.DisposalMethod
member.summary: Specifies, what to do with the last image in an animation sequence.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.DisposalMethod.Unspecified
member.summary: No disposal specified. The decoder is not required to take any action.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.DisposalMethod.NotDispose
member.summary: Do not dispose. The graphic is to be left in place.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.DisposalMethod.RestoreToBackground
member.summary: Restore to background color. The area used by the graphic must be restored to the background color.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.DisposalMethod.RestoreToPrevious
member.summary: Restore to previous. The decoder is required to restore the area overwritten by the graphic with what was there prior to rendering the graphic.

member.name: T:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor
member.summary: The Logical Screen Descriptor contains the parameters necessary to define the area of the display device within which the images will be rendered

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.Width
member.summary: Width, in pixels, of the Logical Screen where the images will be rendered in the displaying device.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.Height
member.summary: Height, in pixels, of the Logical Screen where the images will be rendered in the displaying device.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.Packed
member.summary: Packed Fields, which contains important flags.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.Background
member.summary: Index into the Global Color Table for the Background Color. The Background Color is the color used for those pixels on the screen that are not covered by an image.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.AspectRatio
member.summary: Factor used to compute an approximation of the aspect ratio of the pixel in the original image.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.GlobalColorTableFlag
F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.SortFlag
member.summary: Indicates whether the Global Color Table is sorted. If the flag is set, the Global Color Table is sorted, in order of decreasing importance. Typically, the order would be decreasing frequency, with most frequent color first.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.ColorResolution
member.summary: Number of bits per primary color available to the original image, minus 1. This value represents the size of the entire palette from which the colors in the graphic were selected, not the number of colors actually used in the graphic.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifLogicalScreenDescriptor.GlobalColorTableSize
member.summary: If the Global Color Table Flag is set to 1, the value in this field is used to calculate the number of bytes contained in the Global Color Table.

member.name: T:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor
member.summary: Each image in the Data Stream is composed of an Image Descriptor, an optional Local Color Table, and the image data. Each image must fit within the boundaries of the Logical Screen, as defined in the Logical Screen Descriptor.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.Left
member.summary: Column number, in pixels, of the left edge of the image, with respect to the left edge of the Logical Screen. Leftmost column of the Logical Screen is 0.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.Top
member.summary: Row number, in pixels, of the top edge of the image with respect to the top edge of the Logical Screen. Top row of the Logical Screen is 0.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.Width
member.summary: Width of the image in pixels.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.Height
member.summary: Height of the image in pixels.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.Packed
member.summary: Packed value which contains all flags.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.LocalColorTableFlag
member.summary: Indicates the presence of a Local Color Table immediately following this Image Descriptor.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.SortFlag
member.summary: Indicates whether the Local Color Table is sorted. If the flag is set, the Local Color Table is sorted, in order of decreasing importance.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.LocalColorTableSize
member.summary: If the Local Color Table Flag is set to 1, the value in this field is used to calculate the number of bytes contained in the Local Color Table.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifImageDescriptor.InterlaceFlag
member.summary: Indicates if the image is interlaced. An image is interlaced in a four-pass interlace pattern.

member.name: T:ImageTools.IO.Gif.LZWDecoder
member.summary: Uncrompress data using the LZW algorithmus.

member.name: M:ImageTools.IO.Gif.LZWDecoder.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets the stream, where the compressed data should be read from.
member.param: The stream. where to read from.

member.name: M:ImageTools.IO.Gif.LZWDecoder.DecodePixels(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes and uncompresses all pixel indices from the stream.
member.param: The width of the pixel index array.
The height of the pixel index array.

member.name: T:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifGraphicsControlExtension
member.summary: The Graphic Control Extension contains parameters used when processing a graphic rendering block.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifGraphicsControlExtension.Packed
member.summary: Packed value which contains all flags.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifGraphicsControlExtension.DisposalMethod
member.summary: Indicates the way in which the graphic is to be treated after being displayed.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifGraphicsControlExtension.TransparencyFlag
member.summary: Indicates whether a transparency index is given in the Transparent Index field. (This field is the least significant bit of the byte.)

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifGraphicsControlExtension.TransparencyIndex
member.summary: The Transparency Index is such that when encountered, the corresponding pixel of the display device is not modified and processing goes on to the next pixel.

member.name: F:ImageTools.IO.Gif.GifGraphicsControlExtension.DelayTime
member.summary: If not 0, this field specifies the number of hundredths (1/100) of a second to wait before continuing with the processing of the Data Stream. The clock starts ticking immediately after the graphic is rendered. This field may be used in conjunction with the User Input Flag field.
